entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Coaticook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.5°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to flurries late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
